long_description: With an integrated belay plate, the Edelrid Belay Station Sling Deluxe makes it easy to construct an anchor and belay 1 or 2 seconding climbers on a multipitch rock climb. Clove hitch the high-strength nylon sling to 2 anchor points then use the belay plate to bring up your follower. Can also be used for rappelling; asymmetric design with 2 different friction modes lets you determine the speed you want to rappel at. For use with ropes with a diameter between 7.8 and 10.5mm. Edelrid Belay Station Sling Deluxe has a 22kN breaking strength.
short_description: With an integrated belay plate, the Edelrid Belay Station Sling Deluxe makes it easy to construct an anchor and belay 1 or 2 seconding climbers on a multipitch rock climb.
